body:
Hello,



I am installing ladybug+honeybee but I could not find where to download falsecolor.exe?

The old link in the release notes does not work anymore.

Anyone has any idea??



Thanks in advance!

replies.body:
Hi Oneiric,

Let me know if the attached file works.
I also updated the download link. You can now [download it from github](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/honeybee/blob/master/resources/falsecolor2.exe?raw=true).

I haven't tried it but it looks like the one below is the one I used before.

Thank you anyway I'll try it anyway, thank you!
